There were so many instances where I just couldn't handle the emotional baggage TLOU2 would throw at me\, and it baffles me that a **** videogame can make me and many others feel this way. The amount of stress I would have during encounters and scavenging was incredible\, and it only made the gameplay more surreal with its polished mechanics further enhancing. It is by far\, the most impressive thing gaming has been able to do. The team at Naughty Dog has not only set a far higher standard for themselves and other cinematic games but the entertainment industry as a whole. And although this game was emotionally tough for me\, it's been something I have been trying to seek in videogames as of late. I've gotten tired of happy ending **** This game was a breath of fresh air. It helped especially for me that I knew the game was its entity. If this game were to of given me choices throughout the game that would change the storyline whether subtle or drastic\, I honestly would have put my controller down and walked away.
